root.name: Worms 4: Mayhem
root.description: Like Worms 3D, Worms 4 Mayhem takes the traditional turned based strategy of the Worms series and applies it to a 3D world. Worms 4 also brings new features, weapons, and online play into the mix. The most noticeable additions to this game are the ability to further customize your worms with clothing and a create-a-super weapon option.
